# Pyllusion

A Python Module for Generating Visual Illusions



## Installation

```
pip install https://github.com/DominiqueMakowski/Pyllusion/zipball/master
```

## Features

```{python}
import pyllusion as pyl

pyl.autostereogram(stimulus="3D", width=1024, height=768)
```
